Module io.github.sosuisen.api.jfxbuilder.controls
Package io.github.sosuisen.jfxbuilder.controls

Class TextFieldSkinBuilder

java.lang.Object
io.github.sosuisen.jfxbuilder.controls.TextFieldSkinBuilder
public class TextFieldSkinBuilder extends Object
The TextFieldSkinBuilder class constructs instances of the TextFieldSkin class and offers a fluent interface for creating and configuring it.

This class includes a static create method that accepts the same arguments as the original TextFieldSkin constructor and returns an instance of the TextFieldSkinBuilder.

You can use method chaining to call the builder methods for configuring the TextFieldSkin. Finally, invoke the build method to generate an instance of the TextFieldSkin class.

Note that intermediate builder methods are not evaluated until the build method is called, meaning they are evaluated lazily.

Author:
Hidekazu Kubota <hidekazu.kubota@gmail.com>

    • create

      public static TextFieldSkinBuilder create(TextField control)
      Accepts the constructor arguments of TextFieldSkin(TextField) and returns an instance of TextFieldSkinBuilder.
      Returns:
      an instance of the TextFieldSkinBuilder.

    • build

      public TextFieldSkin build()
      Builds and returns an instance of the TextFieldSkin class.

      Intermediate builder methods are not evaluated until the build method is called; in other words, they are evaluated lazily.

      Returns:
      new instance of the TextFieldSkin class

    • apply

      public TextFieldSkinBuilder apply(Consumer<TextFieldSkin> func)
      Applies a function to the TextFieldSkin instance being constructed. Most operations on the instance can be performed using this method.
      Returns:
      builder instance
